devdoc.details: allow a whitelisted set of addresses to purchase SARCO tokens, for stablecoins (USDC), at a set rate

params._offer_expiration_delay: Delay from the contract deployment to offer expiration, in seconds
params._sarco_allocations: List of SARCO token allocations, should include decimals 10 ** 18
params._sarco_allocations_total: Checksum of SARCO token allocations, should include decimals 10 ** 18
params._usdc_to_sarco_rate: How much SARCO one gets for one USDC (multiplied by 10**18)
params._vesting_end_delay: Delay from the purchase moment to the vesting end moment, in seconds

execute_purchase(address).details: Purchases Sarco for the specified address (defaults to message sender) in exchange for USDC.

returns._0: A tuple: the first element is the amount of SARCO available for purchase (zero if the purchase was already executed for that address), the second element is the USDC cost of the purchase.

recover_unsold_tokens().details: If unsold_sarco_amount > 0 after the offer expired, sarco tokens are send back to sacro_dao.

devdoc.title: PurchaseExecutor
